mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.name AS categoryName, t3.name AS supplierName, t4.name AS manufacturerName, t5.name AS locationName, t6.name AS depreciationName FROM itam_accessories t1 LEFT JOIN itam_categories t2 ON t1.category_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN itam_suppliers t3 ON t1.supplier_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN itam_manufacturers t4 ON t1.manufacturer_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN itam_locations t5 ON t1.location_id = t5.id LEFT JOIN itam_depreciations t6 ON t1.depreciation_id = t6.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT t1.*, t2.name AS categoryName, t3.name AS supplierName, t4.name AS manufacturerName, t5.name AS locationName, t6.name AS depreciationName FROM itam_accessories t1 LEFT JOIN itam_categories t2 ON t1.category_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN itam_suppliers t3 ON t1.supplier_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN itam_manufacturers t4 ON t1.manufacturer_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN itam_locations t5 ON t1.location_id = t5.id LEFT JOIN itam_depreciations t6 ON t1.depreciation_id = t6.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
